div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 194 Chalcis environs, Euboea, 1913 (231) Burial: c. 225-200 B.C.? (T) Contents: c. 200 AR Carystus: 31 didr. (21 with cock, 10 with royal hd.) Euboean League: 61 dr. and fr. Flans: 120 Disposition: Jameson 2 (cat. 2067, 2072); New York 6 flans; Berlin 1 (didr. with royal hd.) Jameson III (Paris, 1924), under no. 2072
